ValidationRule.description: Billing Email Required for Enterprise Closed Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <>"Customer Success Manager",
OR ( ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise - Starter") ), AND ( CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Closed Won"), ISBLANK(Launch_Darkly_Billing_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Billing Email Required for Enterprise Closed Won.
